notes: Aftab Ahmed 50 off 42 balls in 64 mins
Mashrafe Mortaza off 26 balls in 29 mins

milestones.description: Mortaza has broken the record for most sixes in an innings (5) in ODIs for BAN, going past Mohammad Rafique's 4
Habibul Bashar has become the top scorer for BAN in ODIs with 1840 runs, going past Khaled Mashud's 1818
Majid Haq has conceded the most runs in an innings (57) in ODIs for SCOT, going past Asim Butt's record of 55
John Blain and Glenn Rogers's 42-run partnership is SCOT's highest for the 9th wicket in ODIs, breaking the record of 23 between Craig Wright and Paul Hoffmann
This is the highest match aggregate (410) involving teams Bangladesh & Scotland in ODIs
Bangladesh's 147-run win against Scotland is the largest margin of victory in terms of runs in ODIs, beating 131-run win against Kenya

stories.title: Scotland batting simply not good enough
stories.subTitle: Bangladesh v Scotland, 2nd ODI, Dhaka
stories.summary: Bangladesh had few problems in disposing of Scotland for the second time in three days, but another crushing defeat at Dhaka - the margin was 146 runs - left the Scots with some major headaches as the World Cup looms
